channel.title: Help making friends?
channel.description:
hi moparscape I need some advice
im looking to buy some mints to improve my popularity at school. I wanna be 'that guy with the mints' so people know me and can come to me and ask for a mint at any time and i can give them one or two. mark the mint man, they might call me.
my question is, what mints do you think i should get? i need a flavor everyone will like, and im looking to buying a very very large amount in bulk. Idk like 10kg of them or something. got $500 to work with.
maybe something like altoids? what kind of mints would you like knowing your reliable friend has on him? suggest me some mints moparscape
EDIT:I got this idea because well my father suggested it to me since ive had a rough go at making friends my father doesn't have many friends either, but he brings gum to work and people call him doublemint dave (because he carries doublemint gum), and that people like it. So I thought it might work for me too.

item.title: Help making friends?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I once had a friend I met because he carried a bag of LIFESAVERS® Wint O Green® Sugar Free Pep O Mints in his backpack. But one day he ran out and I stopped hanging out with him… Make sure you also buy enough because a cheerleader might even ask for one and the last thing you want do is be Mintless Mark.

Read full topic

item.title: Help making friends?
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

What i did to get friends was to give everyone in the class a pencil that said “i love you” on the side of each individual pencil. and every morning I would tell them I loved them and then make out with them after class.

Read full topic

item.title: Help making friends?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Hey friend,

Back in high school I was in the same situation you are currently in. The many options for mints posed a huge problem as there were so many different kinds of flavors. In the end I chose the mint flavored altoid mints because the quality, aesthetics, and taste couldn’t be beaten.

Buying in bulk is always a good idea if you know what you want and you have space. As a broke college student, I can’t buy too many items in bulk because they tend to fill up my undersized dorm room closet. Like I started with 64 packs of instant noodles in the beginning of the semester, and now I am down to about half. If I buy even more, there will be no room to store beer bottles and vodka. Then again, I am broke so I don’t even have any liquor right now. Sorry for your loss.

All in all, can’t go wrong with mint flavored mints. I have confidence that they will help you make more friends.

Read full topic
